title: I want to look back in the 70\'s,80\'s and 90\'s for shoe stores that had picture taken for grand openings or any other reasons.I went to the Library back in 1989 and found local adds on micro  fish,Im not sure how  or if I can do this on a computer.Thanks  jerrywaustin.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8275 Hope this helps.
